body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Robert Barnes and the customer's name is Carolyn Nelson.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Robert Barnes, and I am a customer service representative at Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Robert! Nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you too, Carolyn! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m feeling a bit frustrated with my current motorcycle situation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Carolyn. Can you please tell me more about what's going on?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, I've been experiencing some issues with the engine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand that can be quite concerning. Before we proceed, may I have your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you also provide me with your address for verification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it’s one two three Main Street, Springfield.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for sharing that information, Carolyn. I will look into your engine issues right away.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help, Robert.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time today. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
